item.description:
SAVVY TEA is the new kid on the block in Madison and is fast become a local favorite of many of us who enjoy having a place to sit and relax, sip a cup of tea, take advantage of free Wi-Fi, or nibble wonderful cheeses, baked goods, paninis, salads, chicken pot pie or quiche. http://www.savvyteago...


This is not a restaurant with an extensive dinner menu, but what they offer always has a flair!

Join us for a casual evening of relaxation, good food and jazz (duo from NYC is terrific!) at Saavy Tea in Madison.

4 COURSE PRIX FIXE MENU - $25.
BYOB if you'd like a glass of wine - they'll uncork and pour

APPETIZER:
Guyere Cheese Puffs
SALAD
ENTREE, choice of:
Tuscan White Beans with Tomato Ragu
Cajun Chicken Lasagne
DESSERT, choice of:
Lemon Pound Cake with fresh Berries
Cheese Plate
COFFEE / TEA

REGULAR MENU (click to see) also available
item.how_to_find_us: It's small...you'll spot us! (reservation in my name)

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Something New and Jazzy
